block_comment: This block manages the setup of the 'stg2_final_r' register on the positive edge of the 'clk' signal. It utilizes non-blocking assignment (=) with a delay defined by '#TCQ'. On each 'clk' rising edge, the value of 'stg2_final_ns' is assigned to 'stg2_final_r' after a delay corresponding to '#TCQ'.
